projects.title: Suzuwalk
projects.bodyText:
- Suzuwalk is a 100% Metaverse-ready platform where you can move to earn, play to earn, and socialize to earn. 
 - You, as a member, can adopt a dog, play in-universe games, earn based on your in-universe activity, compete for rewards, and socialize with other Suzuwalk members.

projects.title: Suzuverse C2C Marketplace
projects.bodyText:
- The marketplace of Suzuvere is your one-stop destination for listing and trading digital assets including 3D avatar, 3D images. 
 - Provide for C2C

projects.title: Suzuverse C2C Marketplace
projects.bodyText:
- The marketplace of Suzuvere is your one-stop destination for buying Suzuverse Stuff. 
 - Provide for B2C

projects.title: Suzuverse AMS
projects.bodyText: - AMS is a place where you can check all of the information of your SUZUVERSE account including SUZUVERSE Wallet, SUZUVERSE Affiliate and also a place where you can manage your assets (Earners, Avatars, ect).

projects.title: Biteclipse
projects.bodyText: - BitEclipse is all in one online trading platform for multi-asset trading created with long financial market experience and sophisticated FinTech and ICT technology.

projects.title: Btrans.io
projects.bodyText: - An NFT Marketplace provides you with the opportunity to create (mint), sell, purchase, bid on, collect, trade, showcase and otherwise transact digital

projects.title: Finstro Trade
projects.bodyText:
- Finstro is the leader in Trade Payments and our partnership allows us to extend longer and more flexible trade terms to our valued business customers. 
 - Finstro is a business partner in Trade Payments and seeks to inspire growth in B2B trade through innovative and integrated financial solutions.

projects.title: Social Trading
projects.bodyText:
- Minna no Systore is a type of SysTrade service provided by Minna no FX of Traders Securities.  
 - Copy trading enables individuals in the financial markets to automatically copy positions opened and managed by other selected individuals

projects.title: FX Trading
projects.bodyText: - Traders Securities offers an impressive array of financial instruments for trading. Apart from the usual suspects like forex and securities, the firm also allows trading in options and popular crypto assets like Bitcoin and Ethereum

projects.title: School Management System
projects.bodyText: - SMAS is an electronic contact book from Viettel Group that helps connect schools with parents, helping teachers and parents to communicate right on the application with the purpose of improving the quality of teaching and learning of children.
